title: ServerWhere
author: ServerWhere
content: ServerWhere.com (SW), a global digital currency-powered IaaS platform announced the immediate availability of 1 Gbps Cloud and Dedicated Servers, hosted in Milan data centers.The Italy Dedicated Servers and Europe Cloud Servers feature 1-gigabit unmetered bandwidth and delivered from Milan-based data centers.The budget Italian 1 Gbps Dedicated Server plan features an Intel Xeon E3-1245v5, 32 GB RAM, 2 x 480 GB SSD disks, and 1000 Mbps dedicated bandwidth on the 1-gigabit unmetered port. The SW platform users can use a Linux OS or a Windows OS. Other available customizations are a choice of IPv4 and IPv6 address space, Web server software, backup storage, Management service, etc. All SW' Italy-based dedicated servers are Cloud-ready and can be provisioned with VMware ESXi or Proxmox VE virtualization technologies.SW is the leading global digital currency-powered platform for delivering custom-built Cloud Servers and physical Dedicated Servers. In Italy, the platform uses Equinix and FastWeb data centers to deliver dedicated and cloud hosting services.   ServerWhere has recently launched 10 Gbps Dedicated Servers and 10 Gbps Cloud VPS hosting services delivered from data centers in Toronto and Montreal, Canada.About ServerWhere.comServerWhere.com is a new-generation Cloud Infrastructure service provider. SW increases the value of cryptocurrencies. The SW's IaaS platform charges its customers for the IT infrastructure services it provides only in cryptocurrencies and does not use fiat currencies.
